ComicInfo.Summary: Eight million robots walk the streets, but this isn't science fiction. This is New York City, top to bottom, from a basement in the last Brooklyn ghetto to the clouds above a penthouse suite on Park Avenue. These are robots in agony, ecstasy and everything in between, searching for love, sex or just enough spare change to get them through the day. Valeria is in the spotlight and in the dark. She's larger than life on every billboard, but inside she feels small beside a brother she thinks is a hero cop. Marco wears a badge that nobody gave him, knocking on doors under the false guise of an officer of the law. Harassing petty crime deadbeats and Wall Street money, but what happens when a real crime brings the real NYPD?
